title: The Future of EOF: Layer 1, Layer 2, and Beyond!
description:
While the EVM Object Format provides a mechanism to modernize the EVM, the container format itself provides a stable path for innovation and experimentation within the base and rollup layers of ethereum, as well as rollup layers, and even chain free execution.

In this presentation we will show how the structure of the EOF container may be adapted to support these potential use cases.
